member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Clonable.ClonableFactory
member.summary: Holds the current factory for cloning objects.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.ClonableFactory.GetFactory
member.summary: Gets the current factory for cloning objects.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.ClonableFactory.SetFactory(Diamond.Core.Clonable.IObjectCloneFactory)
member.summary: Sets the current factory for cloning objects. This value can be set directly or by referencing a NuGet package that implements the IObjectCloneFactory interface.

member.name: T:Diamond.Core.Clonable.CloneableObject
member.summary: Supports cloning, which creates a new instance of a class with the same value as an existing instance.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.CloneableObject.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

member.name: M:Diamond.Core.Clonable.CloneableObject.OnClone
member.summary: A class that inherits from Clonable can implement this member to override the default cloning mechanism.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
